name: Dead-cold Brew
description:
You died. That’s sad. Wanna know what’s worse? You died working. What’s even worse? You have to keep doing it. Dead-cold Brew is a game about Beau, a ghost that worked itself to death, and keeps on going even after dying because they can’t go to the other side with unfinished business. Business meaning customers, coffee and cute-named pastries! Manage your time -- and your will to live! -- while serving people that can’t seem to notice that you’re not exactly alive.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the Halloween Jam 2021 by: Erick Salvador (@nanana_na_nashi): 3D Artist
Jadhy Scott (@jaajaaj_): 2D and UI Artist
JP Malheiros (@JPdotPNG): Writer and Game Designer
Pedro Henrique Labrador: Audio Designer
Thiago Correia Amaro (@thiagaramo): Programmer Fonts from Dafont by NeutroneLabs and Putracetol Studio
Some audios are from freesound.org and mixkit.co
